constraints.name: interval_intersection
constraints.description: 线段相交的定义：两条线段 [a, b] 和 [c, d] 相交当且仅当 max{a, c} ≤ min{b, d}，它们的交为 [max{a, c}, min{b, d}]
constraints.formal: line_segments_intersect([a, b], [c, d]) if and only if max(a, c) <= min(b, d), intersection = [max(a, c), min(b, d)]

constraints.name: online_processing
constraints.description: 部分测试点要求在线处理操作，即每次操作的结果可能影响后续操作的输入

constraints.name: degenerate_intervals
constraints.description: 线段可能退化为单点，即 l_i 可能等于 r_i

constraints.name: operation_order_constraint
constraints.description: 在某些测试点中，所有修改操作（opt=2）必须在所有插入操作（opt=1）之后进行
constraints.formal: all operations with opt=2 must come after all operations with opt=1 in some test cases
